steps.conclusion: Title violates the language exam rule and the explicit expectation: for language exams, the title must be exactly the exam name. Instead of "TOEFL", it uses "Preparação para TOEFL", which is akin to the disallowed phrasing "Preparatório para o TOEFL". Consequently, the english_title should also be "TOEFL" rather than "TOEFL Preparation". These errors affect the key fields being evaluated (title, english_title).
None. Output language is Portuguese, only one suggestion is provided, is_language_course is true, title length is ≤5 words, icon starts with tabler-, and the description is in Portuguese.

- Change title to "TOEFL".
- Set english_title to "TOEFL".
- Keep is_language_course as true and retain one suggestion only.
- Optionally choose an icon more closely tied to exams (e.g., tabler-certificate), though current icon is acceptable.
